actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: To express the sense of the House of Representatives that the maximum Pell Grant should be increased to $5,800.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the maximum Pell Grant, under student aid provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965, should be increased to $5,800.

titles.title: To express the sense of the House of Representatives that the maximum Pell Grant should be increased to $5,800.
